translation: Dafangguang fo huayan jing, vol. 75

source_sentence: 于闐國三藏實叉難陀奉　制譯
translation: translated into Chinese by the Tripiṭaka Master Shikṣu Nanda Bodhisattva of Yutan

source_sentence: 入法界品第三十九之十六
translation: Chapter Thirty-nine and Sixteen of the Entry into the Dharma Realm

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子向迦毘羅城，思惟修習受生解脫，增長廣大，憶念不捨。
translation: It was then that Sudhana went to Kapilavastu, contemplating and cultivating the liberation of sentient beings, which grew in strength and became so vast as to remember without giving up.

source_sentence: 漸次遊行，至菩薩集會普現法界光明講堂，其中有神，號：無憂德，與一萬主宮殿神俱，
translation: In this assembly there was a deity named Virtue of No Sorrow, accompanied by ten thousand palace spirits.

source_sentence: 來迎善財，作如是言：「善來丈夫！
translation: He came to greet Shanzai and said, Well come, husband!

source_sentence: 有大智慧，有大勇猛，能修菩薩不可思議自在解脫，心恒不捨廣大誓願，
translation: With great wisdom and great courage, they can cultivate the inconceivable liberation of enlightening beings. Their minds never give up their vast vows.

source_sentence: 善能觀察諸法境界；
translation: They are able to observe the sphere of all phenomena.

source_sentence: 安住法城，入於無量諸方便門，成就如來功德大海；
translation: Abiding securely in the city of truth, they enter measureless doors of liberation and develop the ocean of virtues of buddhahood.

source_sentence: 得妙辯才，善調眾生，獲聖智身，恒順修行，知諸眾生心行差別，令其歡喜趣向佛道。
translation: They attain marvelous eloquence, skillfully tame sentient beings, attain the body of noble wisdom, always cultivate it, know the differences in mental actions of sentient beings, and cause them to joyfully head toward the Buddha

source_sentence: 「我觀仁者修諸妙行心無暫懈，威儀所行悉皆清淨，汝當不久得諸如來清淨莊嚴無上三業，
以諸相好莊嚴其身，以十力智瑩飾其心，遊諸世間。
translation: They adorned their bodies with various marks and embellishments, adorned their minds with the ten powers of wisdom, and traveled to all worlds.

source_sentence: 我觀仁者勇猛精進而無有比，不久當得普見三世一切諸佛聽受其法，不久當得一切菩薩禪定解脫諸三昧樂，
translation: Soon I will see and hear the teachings of all buddhas of past, present, and future. Soon I will attain the bliss of concentration that liberates all enlightening beings from their meditations.

source_sentence: 不久當入諸佛如來甚深解脫。
translation: Soon, he'll enter the profound liberation of the buddha-tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 見善知識親近供養，聽受其教，憶念修行，不懈不退，無憂無悔，無有障礙，
translation: They see spiritual benefactors and become intimate with them. They listen to their instructions, remembering and applying them without slackening or retreating. Without sorrow or regret they do so without hindrance.

source_sentence: 魔及魔民不能為難，不久當成無上果故。」
translation: Māra and the Māra's people won't be able to make difficulties, for it won't be long before they achieve the unsurpassed fruit.

source_sentence: 善財童子言：「聖者！
translation: The boy of good fortune said, Sage!

source_sentence: 如向所說，願我皆得。
translation: As you said before, may I attain them all.

source_sentence: 聖者！
translation: Noble one!

source_sentence: 我願一切眾生，息諸熱惱，離諸惡業，生諸安樂，修諸淨行。
translation: May all sentient beings cease their burning and torment, part with bad actions, give rise to peace and happiness, and cultivate pure practices.

source_sentence: 聖者！
translation: Noble one!

source_sentence: 一切眾生，起諸煩惱，造諸惡業，墮諸惡趣，若身若心恒受楚毒，菩薩見已心生憂惱。
translation: All sentient beings give rise to afflictions, create bad actions, and fall into bad destinies, and whether they experience pain in body or mind, the bodhisattva becomes sad and distressed when he sees them.

source_sentence: 聖者！
translation: Noble one!

source_sentence: 譬如有人，唯有一子，愛念情至，忽見被人割截肢體，其心痛切不能自安。
translation: Suppose there is a man who has only one child with affection for him. Suddenly he sees someone cutting off his limbs and body, and his heart is so pained that he cannot be at ease.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，見諸眾生以煩惱業墮三惡趣受種種苦，心大憂惱。
translation: Similarly, the bodhisattva Mahāsattva sees that sentient beings fall into the three bad destinies because of afflictive actions and experience various kinds of suffering and great grief in their minds.

source_sentence: 若見眾生起身、語、意三種善業，生天人趣受身心樂，菩薩爾時生大歡喜。
translation: If they see sentient beings who give rise to the three kinds of good actions in body, speech, and mind and are born in heaven or human destinies and experience physical and mental bliss, the bodhisattva then becomes greatly joyous.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 菩薩不自為故求一切智，不貪生死諸欲快樂，不隨想倒、見倒、心倒、諸結、隨眠、愛見力轉，
translation: “Enlightening beings do not seek omniscience for their own sake; they do not crave the pleasures of birth and death. They do not develop along with the errors of ideation, of views, of thought, of fetters, of latencies,

source_sentence: 不起眾生種種樂想，亦不味著諸禪定樂，非有障礙、疲厭、退轉住於生死。
translation: They don't give rise to various kinds of pleasant thoughts in sentient beings and don't taste the pleasures of meditation, and they don't have obstructions, weariness, exhaustion, or retrogression from birth-and-death

source_sentence: 但見眾生於諸有中，具受無量種種諸苦，起大悲心，以大願力而普攝取。
translation: They simply see that sentient beings in all existences experience measureless various kinds of suffering, give rise to great compassion, and use the power of their great vow to universally embrace them.

source_sentence: 悲願力故，修菩薩行，為斷一切眾生煩惱，為求如來一切智智，為供養一切諸佛如來，
translation: Because of the power of compassion and vows, they cultivate enlightening practice in order to extinguish the afflictions of all sentient beings; in order to seek the knowledge of omniscience of buddhas and make offerings to all Buddhas.

source_sentence: 為嚴淨一切廣大國土，為淨治一切眾生樂欲及其所有身心諸行，於生死中無有疲厭。
translation: To adorn and purify all vast lands, to purify the pleasures and desires of all sentient beings and their physical and mental actions, they don't tire in birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「聖者！
translation: “Noble one!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩於諸眾生，為莊嚴，令生人天富貴樂故；
translation: “Great enlightening beings adorn sentient beings, causing them to become rich and prosperous among humans and gods.

source_sentence: 為父母，為其安立菩提心故；
translation: They become parents, establishing the determination for enlightenment for their sake.

source_sentence: 為養育，令其成就菩薩道故；
translation: They become nurses, leading into the path of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為衛護，令其遠離三惡道故；
translation: They become guardians, causing them to be far removed from the three evil states.

source_sentence: 為船師，令其得度生死海故；
translation: They become captains of ships, to enable them to cross the sea of birth and death.

source_sentence: 為歸依，令捨諸魔煩惱怖故；
translation: They become refuges, dispelling the fear of demons and afflictions.

source_sentence: 為究竟，令其永得清涼樂故；
translation: They are ultimate, enabling them to attain peace and happiness forever.

source_sentence: 為津濟，令入一切諸佛海故；
translation: They become rivers of salvation, enabling one to enter the ocean of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 為導師，令至一切法寶洲故；
translation: They become guides, leading people to all the continents of the Teaching.

source_sentence: 為妙華，開敷諸佛功德心故；
translation: They become exquisite flowers, blooming with the virtues of buddhas’ minds.

source_sentence: 為嚴具，常放福德智慧光故；
translation: They become adornments, always radiating the light of virtue and knowledge.

source_sentence: 為可樂，凡有所作悉端嚴故；
translation: They become delightful because whatever they do is done with utmost refinement.

source_sentence: 為可尊，遠離一切諸惡業故；
translation: They become honorable, because they are free from all evil actions.

source_sentence: 為普賢，具足一切端嚴身故；
translation: They become universally good, endowed with all the adornments of body.

source_sentence: 為大明，常放智慧淨光明故；
translation: They become great luminosity, always radiating the pure light of knowledge.

source_sentence: 為大雲，常雨一切甘露法故。
translation: It's because it's a great cloud that always rains all the ambrosia dharmas.

source_sentence: 聖者！
translation: Noble one!

source_sentence: 菩薩如是修諸行時，令一切眾生皆生愛樂、具足法樂。」
translation: When bodhisattvas thus cultivate these practices, they cause all sentient beings to become fond of them and fully possess the happiness of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子將昇法堂，其無憂德及諸神眾，以出過諸天上妙華鬘、塗香、末香，
translation: It was then that Sudhana went up into the great chamber of the house of enlightening beings, and as soon as he had ascended to the seat of enlightenment in the abode of buddhahood, the goddess Sadāparibh

source_sentence: 「汝今出世間，　　為世大明燈，
translation: “Now that you have emerged from the world, You are the great lamp of illumination for the world.

source_sentence: 普為諸眾生，　　勤求無上覺。
translation: For the sake of all sentient beings They diligently seek supreme enlightenment.

source_sentence: 無量億千劫，　　難可得見汝；
translation: For immeasurable hundreds of millions of koṭis of kalpas It will be difficult to see you.

source_sentence: 功德日今出，　　滅除諸世闇。
translation: The sun of virtue now appears, Extinguishing the darkness of all worlds.

source_sentence: 汝見諸眾生，　　顛倒惑所覆，
translation: You see that all sentient beings Are hindered by deluded passions.

source_sentence: 而興大悲意，　　求證無師道。
translation: He arouses great compassion and seeks to realize the teacherless path.

source_sentence: 汝以清淨心，　　尋求佛菩提，
translation: With a pure mind, you seek the enlightenment of buddhas.

source_sentence: 承事善知識，　　不自惜身命。
translation: They serve spiritual benefactors And do not cherish their own bodies and lives.

source_sentence: 汝於諸世間，　　無依無所著，
translation: You have no basis and no attachment in the worlds.

source_sentence: 其心普無礙，　　清淨如虛空。
translation: Their minds are universal and unobstructed, Pure as space.

source_sentence: 汝修菩提行，　　功德悉圓滿，
translation: You cultivate the practice of enlightenment, Perfected in virtue.

source_sentence: 放大智慧光，　　普照一切世。
translation: He emanates great light of wisdom, Illumining all worlds.

source_sentence: 汝不離世間，　　亦不著於世，
translation: You are not apart from the world, Nor do you cling to the world.

source_sentence: 行世無障礙，　　如風遊虛空。
translation: The world moves without obstruction, Like the wind traveling through space.

source_sentence: 譬如火災起，　　一切無能滅；
translation: It’s like the calamity of fire, Which cannot be extinguished by anyone.

source_sentence: 汝修菩提行，　　精進火亦然。
translation: You cultivate the practice of enlightenment, And so is the fire of zeal.

source_sentence: 勇猛大精進，　　堅固不可動，
translation: Their courageous great zeal is Steadfast and unshakable.

source_sentence: 金剛慧師子，　　遊行無所畏。
translation: The lion of adamantine wisdom Travels everywhere without fear.

source_sentence: 一切法界中，　　所有諸剎海，
translation: In all the oceans of buddha-lands in the realm of reality,

source_sentence: 汝悉能往詣，　　親近善知識。」
translation: You're all able to go there and become intimate with good friends.

source_sentence: 及以種種寶莊嚴具，散善財上，而說頌言：爾時，無憂德神說此頌已，
translation: Then the goddess Sadāparibhūta uttered these verses:

source_sentence: 為愛樂法故，隨逐善財，恒不捨離。
translation: Because they love the Dharma, they follow good possessions and never abandon them.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子入普現法界光明講堂，周遍推求彼釋氏女，見在堂內，
translation: Then Sudhana entered the assembly hall, looking everywhere for the daughter of the goddess who was there.

source_sentence: 坐寶蓮華師子之座，八萬四千采女所共圍遶。
translation: He sat on a jeweled lotus lion seat, surrounded by eighty-four thousand beautiful women.

source_sentence: 是諸采女，靡不皆從王種中生，悉於過去修菩薩行同種善根，布施、愛語普攝眾生；
translation: All of these nymphlike maidens had all been born in the royal family. They had all cultivated enlightening practices in the past, planted the same roots of goodness, and gave charity and kind speech to embrace all sentient being

source_sentence: 已能明見一切智境，已共修集佛菩提行；
translation: They were already able to clearly see the sphere of omniscience, and had together cultivated the practice of enlightenment of collecting buddhas.

source_sentence: 恒住正定，常遊大悲，普攝眾生猶如一子；
translation: They always abide in right concentration and always travel with great compassion, taking care of all sentient beings like one child.

source_sentence: 慈心具足，眷屬清淨；
translation: Their compassionate minds are endowed with kindness, and their followers are pure.

source_sentence: 已於過去成就菩薩不可思議善巧方便，皆於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提得不退轉，
translation: Having accomplished inconceivable skillful means for enlightening beings of the past, they all attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 具足菩薩諸波羅蜜；
translation: They are endowed with the transcendent ways of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 離諸取著，不樂生死；
translation: They are free from all attachments and do not delight in birth and death.

source_sentence: 雖行諸有，心常清淨，恒勤觀察一切智道；
translation: Though they practice all existences, their minds are always pure. They always diligently contemplate the path of omniscience.

source_sentence: 離障蓋網，超諸著處，從於法身而示化形；
translation: They are free from the web of obstacles and barriers, transcending all attachments. From the body of reality they manifest their emanating forms.

source_sentence: 生普賢行，長菩薩力，智日慧燈悉已圓滿。
translation: He gave rise to the practice of Samantabhadra, cultivated the powers of enlightening beings, and perfected the lamp of knowledge and wisdom of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子詣彼釋女瞿波之所，頂禮其足，合掌而住，作如是言：「聖者！
translation: It was then that the boy of good fortune went to that woman Gopal, bowed his head at her feet, joined his palms, and stood there, saying, Sage!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，而未知菩薩云何於生死中，而不為生死過患所染？
translation: I've previously aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, but I don't know how an enlightening being isn't stained by the faults of birth and death in birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 了法自性，而不住聲聞、辟支佛地？
translation: They understand the self-nature of dharmas but don't abide in the stages of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas?

source_sentence: 具足佛法，而修菩薩行？
translation: They are endowed with the buddha-dharma and cultivate bodhisattva practices?

source_sentence: 住菩薩地，而入佛境界？
translation: Do you abide in the bodhisattva stage and enter the Buddha's realm?

source_sentence: 超過世間，而於世受生？
translation: Does it transcend the world and yet receive birth in the world?

source_sentence: 成就法身，而示現無邊種種色身？
translation: Accomplishing the Dharma body, yet manifesting limitless various form bodies?

source_sentence: 證無相法，而為眾生示現諸相？
translation: Realizing the signless dharmas, they show their characteristics for sentient beings?

source_sentence: 知法無說，而廣為眾生演說諸法？
translation: Knowing the teaching is not explained, how can they explain it extensively for sentient beings?

source_sentence: 知眾生空，而恒不捨化眾生事？
translation: Knowing that sentient beings are empty, they always don't abandon the task of transforming sentient beings?

source_sentence: 雖知諸佛不生不滅，而勤供養無有退轉？
translation: Even though they know that the buddhas neither arise nor cease, yet they diligently make offerings without turning back?

source_sentence: 雖知諸法無業無報，而修諸善行恒不止息？」
translation: Even though they know that all dharmas lack action and retribution, yet they cultivate good actions without ceasing?

source_sentence: 時，瞿波女告善財言：「善哉善哉！
translation: The woman Gopal then addressed Shanzai, saying, Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今能問菩薩摩訶薩如是行法，修習普賢諸行願者能如是問。
translation: Now, you can ask the bodhisattva Mahāsattva about these practices and cultivate the practices and vows of Samantabhadra who can ask them in this way.

source_sentence: 諦聽諦聽！
translation: Listen closely, and listen closely!

source_sentence: 善思念之！
translation: Consider it well!

source_sentence: 我當承佛神力，為汝宣說。
translation: I will inherit the Buddha’s supernatural power and explain it to you.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩成就十法，則能圓滿因陀羅網普智光明菩薩之行。
translation: If bodhisattvas accomplish ten things, they'll be able to perfect the bodhisattva practice of the universal wisdom and light of the Indra's Net of causation.

source_sentence: 何等為十？
translation: What are these ten?

source_sentence: 所謂：依善知識故，得廣大勝解故，得清淨欲樂故，集一切福智故，於諸佛所聽聞法故，
translation: Because of relying on spiritual benefactors, because of attaining great resolve, because of attaining pure delight, because of accumulating all virtues and knowledge, because of listening to the Teaching heard by buddhas.

source_sentence: 心恒不捨三世佛故，同於一切菩薩行故，一切如來所護念故，大悲妙願皆清淨故，
translation: Because their minds always do not give up the Buddhas of all times, because they are the same as all enlightening practices, because they are protected by all buddhas, because great compassion and mysterious vows are pure.

source_sentence: 能以智力普斷一切諸生死故。
translation: It's because they can use the power of knowledge to universally end all births and deaths.

source_sentence: 是為十。
translation: These are the ten.

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩成就此法，則能圓滿因陀羅網普智光明菩薩之行。
translation: If bodhisattvas accomplish these things, they'll be able to perfect the bodhisattva practice of the universal wisdom and light of the Indra's Net of causation.

source_sentence: 「佛子！
translation: “Child of Buddha!

source_sentence: 若菩薩親近善知識，則能精進不退修習出生無盡佛法。
translation: If bodhisattvas become intimate with good friends, then they can diligently and without regressing cultivate the inexhaustible buddha-dharma that produces it.

source_sentence: 佛子！
translation: Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 菩薩以十種法，承事善知識。
translation: Enlightening beings serve spiritual benefactors by means of ten principles:

source_sentence: 何等為十？
translation: What are these ten?

source_sentence: 所謂：於自身命無所顧惜，於世樂具心不貪求，知一切法性皆平等，永不退捨一切智願，
translation: They do not cherish their own life; they do not covet worldly pleasures in their minds; they know the essence of all things is equanimous; they never turn away from the vow for omniscience.

source_sentence: 觀察一切法界實相，心恒捨離一切有海，知法如空心無所依，成就一切菩薩大願，
translation: Observing all real characteristics of the cosmos of reality, their minds always leaving behind all oceans of existence. Knowing things are like space, they do not rely on anything; they fulfill all great vows of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 常能示現一切剎海，淨修菩薩無礙智輪。
translation: They can always manifest all oceans of worlds, purely cultivating the unobstructed wheel of knowledge of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 佛子！
translation: Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 應以此法承事一切諸善知識，無所違逆。」
translation: You should serve all the good teachers with this teaching, and there's nothing to disagree with.

source_sentence: 「菩薩為利諸群生，　　正念親承善知識，
translation: “Enlightening beings, for the benefit of all living beings, Are correctly mindful and draw near to spiritual benefactors.

source_sentence: 敬之如佛心無怠，　　此行於世帝網行。
translation: Respecting them as buddhas without laziness of mind, this practice is carried out in the worldly emperor's net.

source_sentence: 勝解廣大如虛空，　　一切三世悉入中，
translation: Their resolve is as vast as space, Entering into all times.

source_sentence: 國土眾生佛皆爾，　　此是普智光明行。
translation: So it is with the buddhas and sentient beings of all lands— This is the practice of the light of universal knowledge.

source_sentence: 志樂如空無有際，　　永斷煩惱離諸垢，
translation: Their aspirations and pleasures are like space, without bound. They permanently eliminate afflictions and get rid of all defilements.

source_sentence: 一切佛所修功德，　　此行於世身雲行。
translation: The virtues cultivated by all the Buddhas They practice like clouds in the worldly body.

source_sentence: 菩薩修習一切智，　　不可思議功德海，
translation: Enlightening beings cultivate omniscience With inconceivable oceans of virtue.

source_sentence: 淨諸福德智慧身，　　此行於世不染行。
translation: Purifying the body of merit, virtue, and wisdom, this practice doesn't stain the world.

source_sentence: 一切諸佛如來所，　　聽受其法無厭足，
translation: In the presence of all buddhas and enlightened ones They hear their teachings without weariness.

source_sentence: 能生實相智慧燈，　　此行於世普照行。
translation: Being able to produce the lamp of true characteristic wisdom, this practice universally illuminates the world.

source_sentence: 十方諸佛無有量，　　一念一切悉能入，
